name: Crafted_Sting_of_the_Manticore_E

display_help: Enhances the damage by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}%, endurance costs by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%.
